pets.name: Kidlat
pets.description: Grumpy black cat. We saved him from the streets. He was so small and sickly but he's so big and strong now. Tho, he left the house and never returned. :(

pets.name: Princess Arya
pets.description: She's a scorpio by definition: very protective, passionate, moody, clever and a little bit jealous. You can say I rescued her from the streets, but actually she has saved my life in so many ways since that day that I have no option but feel blessed by her existence

pets.name: Negão
pets.description: He is very smart, active, a good hunter, not long ago was responsible for the birth of several other cats!

pets.name: Molly
pets.description: A cute, but energetic poodle. She's now a little star in a better place.

pets.name: Oripo
pets.description: A dark blue, almost black bubble maker. Eats a lot. Sometimes too much.

pets.name: Royal
pets.description: A big brown good dog, he like's to eat everything, one day he ate my wallet.

pets.name: Snoke
pets.description: Loves to be around people.

pets.name: Wick
pets.description: He makes me change my opinion about cats. I don't know if he is my son or my brother, haha

pets.name: Ada
pets.description: Likes to play with paper balls. Loves to eat. Anything.

pets.name: Bob
pets.description: Loves to bite my shoes, jump in the couch and eat french bread.

pets.name: Toinho
pets.description: A parrot that likes to sing pipoca song

pets.name: Gandalf
pets.description: Loves your three mothers and loves sleep in the sun.

pets.name: nina
pets.description: a beautiful cat that hates strange people

pets.name: Lovey & Ms. Kitty
pets.description: Lovey is the big orange one, and he is exactly how you would expect a cat named Lovey to be. Ms. Kitty can be moody, but she never passes up a good cuddle.

pets.name: Ash
pets.description: a grumpy old schnauzer that loves to play with her two buddies

pets.name: Alfredo
pets.description: the sweetest cat you'll ever meet. i love belly rubs and butt slaps :)

pets.name: Thor
pets.description: Noble and protective dog who loves kills slippers ;).

pets.name: Truta
pets.description: Cachorro mais simpático, gente boa e perfeito que algúem poderia ter.

pets.name: Jake & Moira
pets.description: Siblings who loves sunbathing and sleeping. Jake is on the left, and Moira on the right.

pets.name: Hadu
pets.description: Essa porcariazinha não faz mal a uma pulga.

pets.name: Bethânia
pets.description: Cute little dog.

pets.name: Lírio & Narciso
pets.description: My little fellas. They love to turn off my computer when I'm working
